glsa.title: Avahi: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities were found in Avahi, allowing for Denial of Service.

background.p: Avahi is a system which facilitates service discovery on a local network.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Avahi. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Avahi users should upgrade to the latest version:
